title: Letters to the Editor:  Democracy Talk Resonated
text:
Regarding your editorial "The GOP's Lost Independents" (Nov. 14): President Biden was criticized in conservative circles for speaking out against MAGA extremists in September and again in early November. But it was something he felt compelled to do. I believe that his courageous message resonated with many voters. Many of us are very grateful for the midterm election results.

Mark Brady

Dix Hills, N.Y.
